customContent:
December 3rd is a Day to Give Back

Homelessness hurts. The despair and loneliness are overwhelming. This #GivingTuesday you can give hope to those struggling in the darkness of homelessness.

Your $12 monthly gift provides a warm welcome, nutritious meal, a shower, clean clothes and a safe place to sleep - the first steps to a restored life.

Give back. Donate today and be a part of life change this #GivingTuesday.

presets.message: Provides shelter, meals and care for 1 person
